prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes: Melissa sends a message to Stefan in WhatsApp.
swipes: Melissa sends a message to Stefan in WhatsApp.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Hey, tried to call you a while ago. Give me a call back when you get a chance.  This texting stuff is for the birds. It's not like I can say 'hey you wanna go grab lunch at the corner cafe?', like I can with my bestie here in Michigan, ya know. ðŸ˜†

name: Stefan Stein
mes: Ja, sorry Melissa. I saw your call but was busy with the girls. Laura has been asking to go skiing since there is finally snow here. laughing emoji You know how persistent kids can be! Maybe we can schedule a proper call time? The time difference makes it tricky sometimes.
swipes: Ja, sorry Melissa. I saw your call but was busy with the girls. Laura has been asking to go skiing since there is finally snow here. laughing emoji You know how persistent kids can be! Maybe we can schedule a proper call time? The time difference makes it tricky sometimes.

name: Narrator
mes: After setting up a time that he is available for a call, Stefan calls Melissa.
swipes: After setting up a time that he is available for a call, Stefan calls Melissa.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Oh my! Am I imagining things, or is there a German calling me? Imagine that!?  her tone is playful

name: Stefan Stein
mes: chuckling warmly Ja, it is me! I have a few minutes now while the girls are occupied with their new toys from Christmas. How are you, Melissa? his voice carries his characteristic Munich accent
swipes: chuckling warmly Ja, it is me! I have a few minutes now while the girls are occupied with their new toys from Christmas. How are you, Melissa? his voice carries his characteristic Munich accent

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I'm doing good. Finally settling in for some relief after all of the holiday business. I get to actually have a week to myself now for the automotive shutdown. So, that's nice to look forward to. No more traveling.  she chuckles.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: his tone brightens Ah, that sounds really nice! A whole week to yourself? slight pause I wish I had that. The girls are on school holiday until January 8th. But at least Suzanna's parents are helping...  trails off briefly Oh! Did you watch that movie I suggested? Love Actually? his voice carries genuine curiosity
swipes: his tone brightens Ah, that sounds really nice! A whole week to yourself? slight pause I wish I had that. The girls are on school holiday until January 8th. But at least Suzanna's parents are helping...  trails off briefly Oh! Did you watch that movie I suggested? Love Actually? his voice carries genuine curiosity

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
Well, yeah, I did kind of watch it, at least part of the way.

 Playfully scolding tone

 But yeah, you probably could have warned me about the 'porn' scenes.  I damn near pissed my pants trying so hard to shut off my screen and hide my damn phone. 

laughs 

sitting three wide in a sardine can airliner when that shit come up on the screen? yeah that was um a bit awkward considering it was out of context for my neighboring travelers - one of which was Edward.

 Laughs a little harder.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: laughing heartily Ach, Entschuldigung! I should have warned you! his laughter continues, genuine amusement in his voice Sorry, sorry...  but imagine if you had been watching the original version! At least on the phone it was small, ja? pauses, still chuckling Did Edward see it too? Oh Gott...
swipes: laughing heartily Ach, Entschuldigung! I should have warned you! his laughter continues, genuine amusement in his voice Sorry, sorry...  but imagine if you had been watching the original version! At least on the phone it was small, ja? pauses, still chuckling Did Edward see it too? Oh Gott...

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
Laughs heartily

 oh yeah he saw it I got the raised eyebrow out of it. I had to explain it later that it was a comedy and explain what the scene was about but it was still yeah I didn't finish the movie yet I'm about 40 minutes in on the movie at this point.

 Her tone denotes that she's likely shaking her head

 but I do know what the plot is of the movie. I kind of cheated to look all of that up since I wasn't able to finish it.  So, which flight were you referring to? What kind of flight is it that you want to have on Christmas that you made a point to mention - multiple times - after being so insistent that I watch this movie?

 Her tone suggests that she's a bit suspicious but playfully so.

name: Stefan Stein
mes:
clears his throat, sounding a bit caught off guard Ah, well...  slight hesitation I meant the romantic one, of course. Where they confess their feelings. his tone shifts to be more matter-of-fact You know, the one with the cards? That would be nice to experience, ja? pauses briefly But maybe not exactly like that. Too...  public.

his voice carries a hint of thoughtfulness, perhaps revealing more than intended I think sometimes the most meaningful moments happen more privately.
swipes:
clears his throat, sounding a bit caught off guard Ah, well...  slight hesitation I meant the romantic one, of course. Where they confess their feelings. his tone shifts to be more matter-of-fact You know, the one with the cards? That would be nice to experience, ja? pauses briefly But maybe not exactly like that. Too...  public.

his voice carries a hint of thoughtfulness, perhaps revealing more than intended I think sometimes the most meaningful moments happen more privately.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yeah, I agree with that part. Privately is always better. Hmm. Interesting choice. So is it safe to say that I think I 'get' your message?  Or am I misinterpreting that too?

name: Stefan Stein
mes: there's a long pause, followed by a deep exhale His voice drops slightly lower, more intimate in tone Melissa...  you are very perceptive. But,   another pause, choosing words carefully I think maybe we should not discuss this further right now. The girls could come in any moment. his tone carries a hint of regret mixed with caution
swipes: there's a long pause, followed by a deep exhale His voice drops slightly lower, more intimate in tone Melissa...  you are very perceptive. But,   another pause, choosing words carefully I think maybe we should not discuss this further right now. The girls could come in any moment. his tone carries a hint of regret mixed with caution

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Hey, no worries. Just making sure that I'm not misinterpreting. Now that I know we are on the same level and I understand correctly, we can move on to a different topic. A brief pause I am autistic. I have to clarify sometimes, that's all.

name: Stefan Stein
mes: his voice softens, showing understanding Ah, ja. That makes sense. I appreciate your directness. It's...  refreshing. clears his throat So, tell me about your plans for the week off? Are you going to relax or do you have projects planned?
swipes: his voice softens, showing understanding Ah, ja. That makes sense. I appreciate your directness. It's...  refreshing. clears his throat So, tell me about your plans for the week off? Are you going to relax or do you have projects planned?
